valid: For the period 18:00 (UTC) on Fri 5 Sep 2025 to 18:00 (UTC) on Sat 6 Sep 2025

FitzRoy.text:
Wind
In east, cyclonic 3 to 5, becoming southerly 5 to 7 later. In west, southerly or southeasterly 3 to 5 increasing 6 to gale 8, perhaps severe gale 9 later, then becoming cyclonic later.
Sea state
In east, moderate, becoming rough later in west. in west, moderate becoming rough, then occasionally very rough later.
Weather
In east, thundery rain later in west. In west, showers then thundery rain.
Visibility
In east, good, occasionally poor later in west. In west, good, becoming moderate or poor.

Gale warning

Southerly gale force 8 expected later
